name: Smart Watch
description: A black smart watch with a vibrant, abstract, fiery yellow and orange watch face. It has a black silicone strap and a single button on the right side.

name: Fitness Tracker Watch
description: A black smart watch with a black silicone strap and a classic analog watch face display with white numerals and hands. It has a single button on the right side.

name: Analog Sports Watch
description: A rose gold smartwatch with a white silicone strap, featuring a rectangular black screen and a single button on the side.

name: Digital Watch
description: A chronograph watch with a silver-tone metal bracelet and a dark grey dial. It features three subdials, yellow accents for numbers and hands, and multiple pushers on the side.

name: Luxury Smart Watch
description: A multi-function chronograph watch with a two-tone metal bracelet (black and rose gold) and a black dial with rose gold accents. It has multiple subdials and pushers.

name: Hybrid Smart Watch
description: A classic analog watch with a black dial, gold-tone case, and a black leather strap. The watch face has minimalistic gold markers and hands, with 'Daniel Wellington' branding.

name: Diving Watch
description: An elegant gold-tone analog watch with a white dial and a black alligator-patterned leather strap. It features Roman numerals, a date window, and 'RAYMOND WEIL GENEVE' branding.

name: Mechanical Watch
description: A classic mechanical watch with a silver-tone metal bracelet and a black dial. It features a red and blue 'Pepsi' bezel, a date window, and a cyclops magnification lens over the date.

name: Solar Powered Watch
description: A minimalist analog watch with a silver-tone case, a white dial with simple black hour markers, and a light beige leather strap. The brand 'THISISFETIQUETTE' is visible on the dial.

name: Smartwatch for Kids
description: A classic analog watch with a silver-tone case, a white dial, and a brown leather strap. The watch face features black hour markers and numerals, with 'RIDER' branding and a date window.

name: Skeleton Dial Watch
description: A close-up, black and white image of a mechanical watch with a skeleton dial, revealing intricate gears and mechanisms. The watch face features a prominent balance wheel and elegant, ornate engravings.

name: Chronograph Watch
description: A silver-tone chronograph watch with a black dial and three subdials, featuring white hour markers and hands with red accents. The watch has a tachymeter bezel and is resting on a textured concrete surface with a blurred natural background.

name: Eco-Drive Watch
description: A Citizen Eco-Drive watch with a stainless steel bracelet and a black patterned dial. It features silver-tone hour markers and hands, with 'CITIZEN Eco-Drive SAPPHIRE WR 100' printed on the dial. The watch is displayed on a grey watch cushion.

name: G-Shock Watch
description: A rugged black G-Shock watch with orange accents on the dial and bezel. It features both analog and digital time displays, and is resting on a dark grey fabric surface.

name: Michael Kors Chronograph Watch
description: A silver-tone Michael Kors chronograph watch with a black dial and three subdials. It features Roman numeral XII and stick hour markers. The watch is being held and has blurred orange and teal lights in the background.

name: Fossil Chronograph Watch
description: A black Fossil chronograph watch with a black dial and three subdials. It features white hour markers and hands with red accents. The watch is positioned on a reflective surface, creating a mirror image below it, with a blurred warm-toned background.

name: Solar System Watch
description: A gold-tone watch with a unique black dial depicting the solar system, with planets orbiting the sun as hour markers. It has a white leather strap and is being worn on a person's wrist.
